info.title: Cash Machine Mart
info.description: This is the back-end api for Cash Machine Mart.

put.summary: Create or updates the admins email. [Requires_Admin_Access_Token]

200.description: OK - A verification code is sent to the submitted email.

verificationToken.description: This token must be sent back with the verification code. It will be expired in 5 minutes.

verificationCode.description: The code that has been sent to the email.

verificationToken.description: The verification token returned when adding the new email.

200.description: OK - The email is updated successfully.

put.summary: Send password recovery link to the admins email. [Requires_Admin_Access_Token]

200.description: OK - A password recovery link is sent to the admins email. (it expires in 5 minutes)

404.description: Recovery email not found. If there is no registered recovery email.

recoveryToken.description: The recovery token that has been attached to the recovery link sent to the admins email.

200.description: OK - The password hash is updated successfully.
